text: (ye vah vakt tha) jab khuda ne tumhen khvaab mein kuphfaar ko kam karake dikhalaaya tha aur agar unako tumhen jyaada karate dikhalaata tum yaqeenan himmat haar dete aur ladaee ke baare mein jhagadane lagate magar khuda ne ise (badanaamee) se bachaaya isamen to shaq hee nahin ki vah dilee khyaalaat se vaaqif hai
